document.full_text: kim bi-o's gamble to play in the more lucrative china open rather than a low-key event on home turf, for which he was fined by the korean golf tour (kgt), paid off on sunday as he won the oneasia tour event.
document.title: "rebel" korean kim wins china open
lines_and_colors: kim bi-o's gamble to play in the more lucrative china open rather than a low-key event on home turf, for which he was fined by the korean golf tour (kgt), paid off on sunday as he won the oneasia tour event.
